entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
